forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 17C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Expect widespread areas of smoke and haze, reducing visibility at times. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Expect widespread areas of smoke and haze, reducing visibility at times. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Expect widespread areas of smoke and haze, reducing visibility at times. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Partial clearing late. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 61F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 61F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
